mapper.select: select t.positionname,t.maxnum,t.request,t.money,c.companyname,t.positionaddress from tbl_admin a,tbl_company c,(select * from tbl_position )t where a.cid=c.cid and t.aid=a.aid order by t.positiontime desc limit 3
select c.*, t.Num from tbl_school as c left join (select sid,COUNT(*) AS Num from tbl_resume group by sid) as t on c.sid= t.sid
